plot.description: A Hi-C plot object from \code{plotHicSquare} or\code{plotHicTriangle} on which to annotate pixels

data.description: A string specifying the BED file path, a dataframe in BEDformat, or a \link[GenomicRanges]{GRanges} object specifyingdomain ranges

half.description: A character value specifying which half of hic plotsto annotate

linecolor.description: A character value specifying the color of the domainannotations

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
